entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h then north 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 40%
